reviews.review: IMHO this (and maybe 1.6) is THE original CS experience
补票，我童年第一款单人剧情射击游戏那时感觉这游戏好棒，现在看来游戏里的一些判定、BUG反而让我感觉更有趣

Don't really recommend this game. Don't get me wrong, this game is not bad and is kinda good but considering how old it is, how bad the graphics are, and in general just not great movement. It's not best. Not too many players play it and buying Counter Strike Source or CS:GO is better. Although, CS:GO has way too many cheaters but it is free, after all.
Zagrałem w nią dla śmieszków, później okazało się że jest godna polecenia

I love this game, and in my opinion, it is better that CS:GO. There is still a fair community, the engine is always smooth, even with horrible computer specs. It is quite impressive how I got this game for less than a dollar during sales, included in the 
Complete Valve Collection.
Сначала думал что случайно запустил калл оф дути

Really having fun in CS:CZ in the last Times and even loving the Deleted Scenes can recommend them.

played this when i was a kid...
played this 2 years ago with my friends using LAN and still fun
then CSGO came and took its glory
but overall, good game at its time.

Pros:
-Easy LAN using mobile hotspot without data
-Somewhat seemed 'realistic' at the time.
-Details such as weapon weight, info etc are real

Cons:
-Weapon Accuracy sometimes are just outrageous
-Bots are either kinda stupid, or Ultimate Pro (1 shot from them kills you)
-Sometimes AI's get stuck and ruins the game
-Multiplayer only (No Campaign)
*There is the deleted scenes version though, where the campaign is.

"Cola Roja 5"

El mejor doblaje que escuche en mi vida. Recomendado totalmente.
